categories.title: Description — CITIZENSHIP
description: Facing isolation, reduced mobility, and financial challenges, he finds joy in gardening, nature, and wellness classes. He aspires to live actively, connect with others, and strengthen bonds with family and friends.

categories.title: Description — E-HEALTH
description: Facing challenges with complex e-health services and accessibility, she enjoys crocheting, family time, and traveling with friends. She aims to gain digital skills for managing her health, scheduling appointments, and accessing medical care independently, even while traveling.

Senior University

description: Independency to collect medical analysis and to receive medical prescriptions

description: Gain more digital knowledge to help her  in the e-health process

categories.title: Description - SENIOR UNIVERSITY PROFESSOR
description: As a Senior University professor, she faces challenges creating engaging material and helping older adults overcome tech intimidation. She uses games, videos, and cognitive exercises to foster a supportive, inclusive learning environment and aims to provide resources for independent learning.

categories.title: Struggles
description: Find material to teach her classes
Older adults students are intimated by technology, thinking they are “too old” to learn it
The classes are too short and some older adults may need more time

categories.title: Interests
description: Educational games
Video content
Cognitive learning exercises
Fostering a learning community

categories.title: Ambitions
description: Help her older adults students become more digital independent
Create accessible and inclusive learning tools for the older adults

categories.title: Desires
description: Offer a welcoming, non-judgmental learning environment for the older adults
Provide engaging and interactive gamified material to her older adults classes
Supply her students with material that they can use to learn outside the classroom
